title: Handkerchief, 1951-60-21, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: plain weave, bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes
description: Handkerchief with center of linen and wide bobbin lace border of Brussels lace. Pattern of floral sprays edged by festoons and open flowers.
